view

Class MainWindowController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • view.MainWindowController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer, javafx.fxml.Initializable, View

    public class MainWindowController
extends java.util.Observable
implements View, javafx.fxml.Initializable, java.util.Observer
    The main FXML controller. This class is initialized by the FXML "MainWindowController.fxml" and is in charge of the presentation LOGIC, meaning it notifies the SokobanController for every action the user makes.
    Author:
    Or Priesender

      • displaySolution

        public void displaySolution(java.lang.String solution)
        Dislays the solution given, making a step every second. This function operates in a new thread so the controller will have a change to receive these commands and operate accordingly.
